title: Ronan (Taylor's Version)
description: Taylor is familiar with heartbreak but this is a very different kind. She took a mother's tragic blog and made a beautiful song that will live on forever. Find out all about Ronan, the beautiful little boy whose short life continues to impact others. Please check out ronanfoundation.org/story to learn more!
itunes:author: KiddNation
